function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High concentration of people in cities","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, promoting proper hygiene practices, and increasing healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation systems, and air purification systems","People":"City residents, workers, and visitors","Owner":"City governments, healthcare organizations, and private businesses"},{"Description":"Limited literature on cities and pandemics","Impact":"Lack of preparedness and effective response to pandemics","Mitigation":"Investing in urban research on pandemics, developing pandemic response plans, and increasing public awareness","Technologies":"Data analytics, modeling and simulation tools, and communication platforms","People":"Researchers, urban planners, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Increased frequency of pandemics due to climate change and human encroachment into wildlife habitats","Impact":"Greater threat of future pandemics and urban vulnerabilities","Mitigation":"Addressing climate change, protecting natural habitats, and monitoring zoonotic diseases","Technologies":"Remote sensing, predictive modeling, and early warning systems","People":"Global population, urban residents, and environmental conservationists","Owner":"Governments, environmental organizations, and public health agencies"}]}
